text: Nweuua amdan ar lewqama s imawlan is. Imma s temeen s tadist, temeen di tinnufra. Ger tadist akked ujumi, caret wagguren. Armi ibbwev d anqaqoi, issawev kueet isegwasen, inna: "a Mass iw! Eoo iyi a K snemmre$ af l$it i $ T$atev, nek akked lwaldin iw; ad xedme$ ayen ilhan ara K ioavin. Efk iyi d tarwa ilhan. Aql i utube$ K, aql i seg imvuaen
